title: Truth Gaming LF Coach
body:
Hey there, I am Kairutox, manager of the gaming team Truth Gaming.

We are currently looking for a new coach to really increase our skill level as a team.

To help us improve on the parts of our gameplay that are lacking.

Recent events have shown us that when things go well, we really snowball and hardly allow the other team to get back into the game.

However, if we make a couple mistakes early, we start making more mistakes because we try to do too much with what we have.

If you're interested in taking up the coaching role for Truth Gaming, send me a message!

I look forward to hearing from anyone who would be keen!

replies.body: I can give you some help if you want
Just some teams in Sumsoc last year
And how did they go dude?
Well they were only plat-diamond teams so not really a chance against those challenger teams but yeah Iâ€™d say they improved heaps

add me we will give you a shot,

I'd also like you to get members of the teams you coached to give me feedback on your coaching.
Why would you start a team at low elo

we aren't low elo? we are plat-chall

Why would you assume we are low Elo?
Have you had previous experience as a coach?
Do u guys have a full team?
Yes we do, with a couple subs
